testsuite.name: As a registered user I want to log in to the website

testcase.classname: As a registered user I want to log in to the website
testcase.name: User login with correct data
testcase.failure:
Field with uimap "<page_url:https://dev.rbgsystems.com/customer/account/login/;key:email;type:field;fieldset:log_in_customer>" not found.
+--[ https://dev.rbgsystems.com/customer/account/login/ | Selenium2Driver ] | | 1 exception(s): | Exception #0 (Exception): Unable to proceed: the maintenance mode is enabled. | | Exception #0 (Exception): Unable to proceed: the maintenance mode is enabled. | #0 /var/www/brixton.com/releases/20160906192843/vendor/magento/framework/App/Bootstrap.php(256): Magento\Framework\App\Bootstrap->assertMaintenance() | #1 /var/www/brixton.com/releases/20160906192843/pub/index.php(48): Magento\Framework\App\Bootstrap->run(Object(Magento\Framework\App\Http)) | #2 {main} |
